page.title: 15CLUBS AND RECREATION.
page.content: To join the{BRITISH LEGION}you must have worn the Queen's uniform, also you have to be eighteen. There are 3 snooker tables also darts, cards, dominoes and drink.They also have dances and dinners.It is open every day for 7 to 8 hours.There are 700 to 800 members and on Armistice Day they go out with poppies and collect money.The present building was built about 16 years ago. The{HORTICULTURAL SOCIETY}is for people who enjoy gardening and growing things.It costs Â£1.50 to join for the year.There are 45 people in the society.The society started in 1970.It is organized by the Chairman and the committee.It is open the third Monday of every month.The aim of this society is to provide a meeting place for people who want to learn more and also to travel to gardens and parks.
